"Aqua Rush, hmm." Yue murmured to herself with expectation, wondering what kind of flavor this has. She guessed that it would be a sort of carbonated soft drinks and straightaway sucked first package through a straw…she drained it off in a few seconds.

Yue smacked her lips and blissfully sighed. It was not a carbonated drink, but had the concentrated fruitiness and the refreshingness beyond description.

"I heard it is unique beverage when I stocked up on it, but it was better than I had expected!!" Taking the second package out from the bag, Yue mused. “I'm glad that I've brought a little more than usual. After all, it’s horribly hot today!”

She continued turning over the pages of the book while drinking, but soon her pace slowed and eventually stopped. She had been captivated (or rather, addicted) by its exquisite taste.

--------------------------------

Yue was completely drowning herself in drinking, but loud gurgling noise from her stomach brought her back to reality. She counted the number of empty packages on the desk; 25. She couldn’t believe that now there is no stock in her bag.

Yue grimaced and rubbed her slightly bulged belly. “Ugh…I drank *URP!* too much at once...” She packed the books into a bag and started getting ready to go the dorm, being quite ignorance that Aqua Rush has some 'unique' side effects depending on the person.
